transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, ma'am, bataiye.
Customer: Haan, main ek puchh rahi thi ki ye jo tender set kya hota hai isme kya hai mujhe samajh mein nahi isme jo tender hai latest tender isme jo information deta hai wo kya hota hai?
Executive: Dekhiye, main bata raha hun tender ka jo hamare newspaper vagaira mein aata hai na wahi tender yahan pe bhi rehta hai uska by lead just post hota hai wo ab isme kafi sare tender jo hai governments rehte hain aur kafi sare jo hai privates rehte hain jab aap tenders open karke dekhte ho jaise agar aapko koi bhi lag raha hai ki haan mere kaam ka hai to wahan pe view tender ka rehta hai us pe karte ho to aapki ek by lead consume ho jati hai aur aapko kabhi kabhi screen pe jaise hi aap jo hai view tender pe karte ho aapko ek PDF jaisa ya informative page jaisa open ho jata hai jahan pe tender ki sari information rehti hai aur wahan pe ek contact detail hota hai like site ka link hota hai ya contact number hota hai to aap wo link open karte ho aur wo sab tender submit karne ka form aa jata hai wahan pe aap apni detail vagaira jo hai fill kar dete ho submit kar dete ho to wo aapki tender submit ho jati hai aur agar aapko view tender karne pe screen pe turant nahi aa rahi hai to ye ye ek mail pe aapke aapke registered mail pe PDF ban ke wahan pe aa jata hai to jab aapka ye submit ho jata hai to jahan pe jin logon ne tender dala hai wo jab shortlist karte hain to usme agar company aapki shortlist hoti hai ya aap shortlist hote ho to udhar se wo aapko wapas return jo hai call back vagaira karte hain.
Customer: Theek hai to ye tender hai abhi dekhiye HCL caustic soda Jabalpur Chhattisgarh se aaya hua hai aur haan mujhe ispe bhi abhi just dikh raha tha Rahul Kala ka something Odisha ka dikh raha tha wo water ko ka to ab maine isko bas kya ye bolke view tender information just click kiya
Customer: Uske baad main jab aapko call kiya uske baad main thoda aur kahin pe click karke fir se fir se wo dekhiye to wo dikh nahi raha hai to wo kya hai main isliye bol rahi tender kya hota hai wo kyu nahi dikhe fir se jo jo cheez maine view tender information le liya na
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To fir kahan pe chala kahan pe rukta hai dekhne ke liye?
Executive: Ye aapko mail pe jayega aapke jo registered mail hai na IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Us mail ka hai access aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo actually view karne se ho jata hai mail pe maine kuch view kiya hota hai.
Executive: Haan view jaise aap by lead use karte ho na ma'am contact buyer now pe kar dete ho to by lead use ho jati hai to usme tender mein view tender kar dete ho to aapki ek wo by lead use ho jati hai matlab wo jo hai tender use ho jata hai aapki taraf se use ho jata hai aur wo dobara aapko tender mein nahi dikhta hai ab wo open hoke uska jo hai jaise buyer ka number vagaira by lead use karne pe aata hai detail waise uske tender se related jo information hai wo aapke mail pe aayegi PDF ke roop mein.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur jab aapne use kiya hoga tab bhi aapko display pe kuch dikha hoga page open hua hoga.
Customer: Display dikha hoga wo maine to dekh liya uske baad maine just aise hi maine ye soch kya hai bolke dekh leti main to wo mail pe chala jata hai.
Executive: Haan wo mail pe chala jata hai aur ma'am by lead vagaira use nahi kar rahe ho jo hai abhi by lead use nahi karoge aap to aapki listing aur visibility dono down ho jayegi ma'am.
Customer: Company ab dekhiye jo by leads hai abhi HCL vagaira ki wahi hal filhal mein use kijiye panch lead mein to main dekh raha hun lead aayi hui hai jo hai sulfphonic acid ki aayi hui thi 500 kg ki abhi ek ghante pehle sold out ho gayi hydroclic acid ki taraf chahiye nahi aapko jyada sodium hypo light ki aayi thi 300 liter ki.
Customer: Yahi to amount jo likhte hai na wo amount bahut kam hota hai hum log ke liye isliye hum log dekhte nahi hai.
Executive: Amount order value likha rehta hai.
Customer: Haan wo to hai order value ke amount ke hisab se wo utna ye nahi ho raha isliye hum log nahi dekh rahe.
Executive: Dekhiye agar aap dekhoge nahi na ma'am by lead vagaira use nahi karoge to by lead to aapki lapse ho jayegi dekhiye ek bonus by lead aapko milta hai daily agar aap usko daily nahi use karte ho na ma'am to wo daily hi lapse ho jata hai to ye ek to matlab hai ki ek by lead to minimum aap use kar lijiye aur jo aapko weekly by lead milta hai wo ravivar se shanivar ke liye milta hai man lo aaj usko nahi use kar paye to usko saturday ko 10 by lead ek sath use kar sakte ho aap weekly wala ravivar ko mila ravivar ko nahi use kar paye kisi kaam mein bahut jyada vyast ho gaye direct shanivar ko aap 10 by lead use kijiye but jo daily bonus by lead hai aapka ye to daily milta hai aapko daily lapse ho jata hai agar use nahi karte ho samajh rahe hain to abhi bol rahe hai aap by lead kitne by lead hum log ko related hoga to kuch jaise hum log ke amount ke taraf related ho to bejenge na otherwise kyu aise hi bhar ke bejte rahenge kya isliye nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Ab jo isme HCL mein jo jyada amount ki aa rahi hai usko to use kar sakte hain jaise 2000 kg ka abhi aaya hua hai isko use kar sakte hain ki nahi?
Customer: Achcha isko bhi nahi use kar sakte.
Executive: Nahi nahi kar sakte hain but hum log is wo cheez mein nahi dekh rahe hain na main aapka samajh gaya hun ki margin nahi baith raha hai usme quantity mein jata hai fir bhi but un sab product ki jo by lead hai wo sold out ho ja rahi hai jo hai use karne se pehle hi competition jyada hone ke aas pass ke log le dekho hum jo koi Odisha mein Odisha mein bahut sare log hai na to unke pass jo area mein hoga wo leke chale jayenge na aise hi hota hai aur.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Baki to kuch nahi dikh raha hai theek hai.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai use kijiye samasya hoti hai kuch aur to bataiye.
Customer: Okay theek hai.
Executive: By lead but use kar dijiye ma'am theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about tender set and its information.

- Why tender information not visible after clicking.

- Amount is less in buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained about tender and its process.

- Informed that tender details sent to registered mail.

- Explained benefits of using buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will use buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, buyleads, subscription, visibility
